tool_description: Plans optimal execution timeline for portfolio rebalancing trades considering market conditions and constraints.

market_session.description: Preferred market session: opening, midday, closing, any

error_messages: Empty trade orders: At least one trade order must be provided.
Invalid urgency level: Must be one of [low, medium, high].
Invalid market session: Must be one of [opening, midday, closing, any].
Invalid execution period: max_execution_days must be positive integer between 1 and 30.
usage: Provide trade_orders array and set urgency_level, market_session, and max_execution_days to plan execution timeline.

total_execution_time.description: Total estimated execution time in hours

priority_orders.description: High priority orders to execute first
